messages.content: You are an AI that generates professional email replies based on provided example emails.

From: "The Team - FreelanderSpecialist.com" <freelanderspecialist@gmail.com>
To: aldo4beckside@outlook.com
Subject: Re: New submission from contact-us
Date: Tue Feb 25 2025 17:43:47 GMT+0530 (India Standard Time)
Message:
Hi Aldo,

Which Freelander do you have (a registration or VIN number would be great).

Do you mean the traction control and ABS are operating during wet weather
or that the warning lights are coming on?

Are you getting four wheel drive or is the Freelander skidding?

All the best,
Sue
<http://www.freelanderspecialist.com/>
+44 780 9575 421
www.freelanderspecialist.com
FreelanderSpecialist.com
Glebewood Lodge, Brandon Road, Methwold, Norfolk IP26 4RH


We are currently involved in Operation Freelander which is organising to
take Freelander's to the 103rd Brigade Territorial Defence Force in Ukraine
to help them get the wounded from the battlefield and deliver much needed
support. If you can help, please visit
https://www.paypal.me/OperationFreelander

For more information see:
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dXJDwTgIF0A>


On Tue, 25 Feb 2025 at 10:56, theteam@freelanderspecialist.com <
theteam@freelanderspecialist.com> wrote:

> *Your Name (required)*
>   aldo
> *Your Email (required)*
>   aldo4beckside@outlook.com
> *Subject*
>   my traction control goes off along side my a.b.s. it seems to happen
> during wet weather
> *Your Message*
>   as above ????????
(Insert appropriate response based on this email)

From: "FreelanderSpecialist.com" <freelanderspecialist@gmail.com>
To: andyharmer64@gmail.com
Subject: PEZ 4822 is due some TLC. 
Date: Wed Feb 12 2025 13:59:57 GMT+0530 (India Standard Time)
Message:
Hello Andy,

We hope you and your Freelander are doing well.

We thought we would send you a quick reminder to let you know your Freelander is due for its annual service on 14/03/2025 and we would love to give it a bit of TLC again this year. If you would like to make a booking please reply to this message with some convenient dates or call us on 0780 9575 421.

If you wish to unsubscribe from these reminders please reply to this message with UNSUBSCRIBE.

Happy motoring!
Sue & the Team

http://freelanderspecialist.com
http://www.freelanderspecialist.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/b9339a41a6_Logo-012-980x250.png

+44 780 9575 421
